events.title: Follow-up Email
events.subject_a: Do Not Miss Out on Our New Collection

key_insights: Focus on early adopters and VIP customers first
Segment messaging based on engagement level
strategy_summary.targeting_approach: Start with VIP customers for exclusive early access, then expand to broader audience with different messaging. Target cart abandoners last with urgency-driven offers.
strategy_summary.timing_strategy: Tuesday morning for VIP launch (highest open rates), Friday afternoon for broad announcement (weekend planning), Sunday evening for final push (decision time).
strategy_summary.content_strategy: Lead with exclusivity and innovation for VIPs, emphasize value and benefits for general audience, create urgency and FOMO for late-stage prospects.
